flow.descriptionCdata:
5910366b-490a-4200-83d0-e3b745b5ac66.87862623-73e0-482b-99f9-3d05f5ec17e9.description=
This operation adds a flow variable to the local context. The variable is available in the current flow and its child flows.

Inputs\:
    keyName - The name of the flow variable to add.
    myValue - The value to assign to the flow variable.

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the value of "myValue" input field.

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.

Note\:
   If a flow variable with the same name already exists, its value will be overwritten.
5910366b-490a-4200-83d0-e3b745b5ac66.985af6bc-ed41-4bdf-bcd7-5c8f0165fe62.description=
Checks if a number or word is equal to another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 \=\= value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
5910366b-490a-4200-83d0-e3b745b5ac66.f841b08a-57fd-463c-8b23-3d7582ffc58c.description=
This operation adds a flow variable to the local context. The variable is available in the current flow and its child flows.

Inputs\:
    keyName - The name of the flow variable to add.
    myValue - The value to assign to the flow variable.

Results\:
    returnResult - This is the primary output. It contains the value of "myValue" input field.

Responses\:
    success - The operation completed as stated in the description.

Note\:
   If a flow variable with the same name already exists, its value will be overwritten.
5910366b-490a-4200-83d0-e3b745b5ac66.faf63b5d-26c5-4af6-a9a4-89216c287d6a.description=
Performs a mathematical operation on two numbers

Inputs\:
operator - The operation to perform (+, -, *, /, <, >, <\=, >\=, \=\=, \!\=).
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The result of the operation, for boolean values this is true or false.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully. If a boolean operation, it evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
flow.name: Create vApp from template on Organization
